com.orsoncharts.marker

Class CategoryMarker

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.orsoncharts.marker.AbstractMarker
      • com.orsoncharts.marker.CategoryMarker
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ChartElement, Marker, java.io.Serializable

    public class CategoryMarker
extends AbstractMarker
implements java.io.Serializable
    A marker for a category on a CategoryAxis3D. This marker could be used to highlight one selected category.

    For an example, please refer to the demo CategoryMarkerDemo1.java.

    NOTE: This class is serializable, but the serialization format is subject to change in future releases and should not be relied upon for persisting instances of this class.
    Since:
    1.2
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
